snippet: Broadcasters are trying again to send TV programming to hand-held devices over the air.
abstract: Broadcasters are trying again to send TV programming to hand-held devices over the air.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - For about three years there has been talk about bringing over-the-air TV to hand-held receivers like phones and mini-TVs, but it looks as if the idea is finally gaining some traction. That's not because of a technological breakthrough so much as because of a business breakthrough, although a bit of both is involved.

headline.main: Over-the-Air TV to Your Phone — Again
